subcriteria.description: If the candidate explicitly clarifies technical assumptions of basic difficulty
If the candidate explicitly clarifies technical assumptions of moderate difficulty

criteria.description: Does the candidate account for corner cases?

subcriteria.description: If the candidate explicitly clarifies corner cases of basic difficulty
If the candidate explicitly clarifies corner cases of moderate difficulty

criteria.description: Does the candidate choose the appropriate data structure for the problem?

subcriteria.description: The candidate proposes a working yet suboptimal data structure
The candidate proposes an optimal data structure

criteria.description: Does the candidate select a suitable algorithm for the task?

subcriteria.description: The candidate proposes a suboptimal algorithm
The candidate improves over the algorithm proposed earlier

criteria.description: Does the solution proposed by the candidate have optimal time complexity?

subcriteria.description: The candidate proposes an algorithm with a worst-case time complexity
The candidate proposes an algorithm with an average-case time complexity

criteria.description: Does the solution proposed by the candidate have optimal space complexity?

subcriteria.description: The candidate proposes an algorithm with a worst-case space complexity
The candidate proposes an algorithm with an average-case space complexity
